title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText emits a beep sound when selecting SWT.MULTI. This behavior seems unexpected.
OB: When selecting SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, a beep sound is emitted.
EB: No beep sound should be emitted when selecting SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText.
SR:
1. Open the SWT example ControlExample.
2. Go to the Text tab.
3. Click on Styles -> SWT.SINGLE.
4. Click on Styles -> SWT.MULTI.
